bug.author: mouradmourafiq
bug.summary: Integrate the new force reload behaviour for events/logs/assets
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
The UI does not update charts because of the new caching feature, this is the intended behaviour, but it should use the --force flag to force fetch/update the asset when the runs are not finished. <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Any page on the artifacts/dashboards of an operation that is still running. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
Use the new --force flag when runs are not finished.
<denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
1.0.96
